title: PBE Signup Page 500 Error
body: Hey, I've been trying to sign up for the PBE. However, whenever I go to the page to sign up, I get a 500 error. I've tried clearing my cache and several different browsers, but nothing works.

replies.body: Which link are you using to access the PBE?  In addition to clearing your cache, I also suggest trying incognito mode or another browser in case an extension or something is causing this problem.  Log out of the site, back in, then check the [PBE ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)link.  Hope that helps!
I've tried all of those things and I've been using that link, but I keep on getting a 500 error :/
